name: Jimbu Thakali Thali (Chicken)
description: locally grown rice with dal imported from lower regions to the south ,vegetables,ghee with chicken curry

name: Jimbu Thakali Thali (Mutton)
description: locally grown rice with dal imported from lower regions to the south ,vegetables,ghee with mutton(goat) curry

name: Jimbu Thakali Thali (Fish)
description: locally grown rice with dal imported from lower regions to the south ,vegetables,ghee with fish curry

name: Jimbu Thakali Thali (Veg.)
description: locally grown rice with dal imported from lower regions to the south ,vegetables & ghee

name: Dhido Thali (Chicken)
description: dish prepared by gradually adding flour to boiling water while stirring served with different vegetables and chicken curry.

name: Dhido Thali (Mutton)
description: dish prepared by gradually adding flour to boiling water while stirring served with different vegetables and mutton(goat) curry.

name: Dhido Thali (Veg.)
description: dish prepared by gradually adding flour to boiling water while stirring served with different vegetables.

name: Royal Briyani
description: mixed rice dish originating among the Muslims of the Indian subcontinent as a variety of Persian pilaf. It is made with Indian spices, rice and meat.

name: Tandoori duo Chicken n Lamb
description: fusion of tandoori specialties: chicken tikka, lamb tikka, chicken seekh kabob, lamb seekh kabob, tandoori chicken
